1.name: Rapid Miner
1.descr:
All you guys and girls out there..!! RITU presents " SELFIE WITH YOUR RIDE " ..Just click a selfie with a ride you think suits you the most, upload it and generate the most likes and shares to win prizes worth 1k..
            Submit your entry by 8th April 2016 to ritu official page inbox  RituOfficial along with your name and mobile number.
rules: To participate, message your entries, with the picture and brief introduction(name and school or college) to ritu page.
To participate, message your entries, with the picture and brief introduction(name and school or college) to ritu page.
To participate, message your entries, with the picture and brief introduction(name and school or college) to ritu page.
To participate, message your entries, with the picture and brief introduction(name and school or college) to ritu page.
To participate, message your entries, with the picture and brief introduction(name and school or college) to ritu page.

5.descr: There is nothing Google can't find
